title: J. Frederic Kolhouse, MD Cancer Research Fund
description: To provide support for the cancer research of Wilbur Franklin, MD. Should Dr. Franklin leave the University, then the Fund shall be used to support similar cancer research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide support for the cancer research of Wilbur Franklin, MD. Should Dr. Franklin leave the University, then the Fund shall be used to support similar cancer research at the University.
